General.Name: MEKICS Co Ltd
General.Description: MEKICS CO., Ltd develops and commercializes ventilators worldwide. It offers general-purpose ventilators, respiratory care devices, patient monitoring systems, pulse oximeter, central monitoring system, and high flow nasal therapy products. The company also distributes CPAP solutions that care sleep apnea syndrome and snoring. MEKICS CO., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Paju, South Korea.
